sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: YHN Acquisition I extends business combination deadline with Mingde Technology By Investing.com
feed.summary: YHN Acquisition I (NASDAQ: YHNA) has extended its business combination deadline with Mingde Technology Limited to June 18, 2026. This is the latest in a series of amendments to their merger agreement, which was initially signed on April 3, 2025. The combined company is expected to remain publicly traded on the Nasdaq Stock Market.

feed.title: YHN Acquisition I extends business combination deadline with Mingde Technology
feed.summary: YHN Acquisition I Ltd (NASDAQ:YHNA) has amended its business combination agreement with Mingde Technology Limited, extending the deadline for their proposed merger to June 18, 2026. This is the third amendment to the agreement, which was originally signed on April 3, 2025, and involves Mingde Technology becoming a wholly-owned subsidiary of the surviving entity, publicly traded on Nasdaq.

feed.title: YHN Acquisition I deposits $150,000 to extend business combination deadline
feed.summary: YHN Acquisition I (NASDAQ:YHNAU) has deposited $150,000 into its trust account to extend the deadline for completing a business combination from December 19, 2025, to March 19, 2026. This extension, disclosed in an SEC filing, provides the blank check company with additional time to finalize a potential merger or acquisition. The deposit does not signify a completed transaction but allows the company to continue its search for a suitable target.

feed.title: YHN Acquisition I deposits $150,000 to extend business combination deadline
feed.summary: YHN Acquisition I (NASDAQ:YHNAU, NASDAQ:YHNA, NASDAQ:YHNAR) deposited $150,000 into its trust account to extend its business combination deadline from December 19, 2025, to March 19, 2026. This extension was disclosed in an SEC filing and allows the blank check company more time to seek a suitable merger or acquisition target. The deposit does not guarantee a completed transaction but provides necessary additional time under its trust agreement.

feed.title: YHN Acquisition I appoints Christy Poon Man Ka as CEO following Satoshi Tominaga’s resignation
feed.summary: YHN Acquisition I (NASDAQ: YHNA) has appointed Christy Poon Man Ka as its new Chief Executive Officer and director, effective immediately. This follows the resignation of Satoshi Tominaga, who stated his departure was not due to disagreements with the company. Ms. Poon brings extensive experience in mergers and acquisitions, intellectual property, and marketing, having previously served as a Partner at Norwich Capital Limited and in corporate affairs at XIC Innovation Limited.

feed.title: YHN Acquisition I appoints Christy Poon Man Ka as CEO following Satoshi Tominaga’s resignation
feed.summary: YHN Acquisition I (NASDAQ: YHNA) has appointed Christy Poon Man Ka as its new Chief Executive Officer and director, effective immediately. This follows the resignation of Satoshi Tominaga, which the company states was not due to any disagreements with company operations or policies. Ms. Poon brings extensive experience in mergers and acquisitions, intellectual property, and public relations from her previous roles at Norwich Capital Limited and XIC Innovation Limited.
